name: Reina of Destruction vHJ2.0
description: The idea of the deck is to focus 90% on HQ. Just tear apart every ICE the Corp plays on HQ and run it using Pheromones/Vamp to keep them poor. Economy is Kati Jones and nothing else so a little worrisome since Anarch do better with C:gain 2c actions than shaper or criminal. I could go -3 Kati for +3 Armitage and -3 clone chip for +2 LALA, +1 Crypsis. Never run R&D until the corp is poor and you have a rook (or 2) on R&D ICE. If they can't rez anything it's a free access. I think the deck is too slow right now and would actually go better with Whizzard since your economy is so weak his 3rc to trash will be huge against HB:campaign drip economy decks and JackHo/SanSan grid/etc. Every program is vital imo, I wish I could get enough draw in here to run Freelance coding contracts. 24 programs would get it done. I may try a criminal build with vamp. Syphon/Vamp combo with pheromones and HQ focus could be interesting. At the least it would be a nonstandard archetype. Unless It's being done somewhere else already. lol

name: Chess in the Park, Exile Style
Exiled Chess
description:
Yes, I know Scheherazade doesnt work with with Cassia. That isnt the point. Exile has always had a ton of programs in him, for the recursion and car draw. Why not take advantage of this economic engine?

This is the same idea as Exile Decks from before, in that he has the tools he needs for the job at hand. Except in this case he uses Cassia

name: Deep Whiz (give me my breakers addition
description: got rid of gormans because this deck doesnt set up fast enough. got a crypsis so i can djinn hunt if i need to

name: Reina Fire
description: money, passive economy, and the extra memory that she desperately needs

name: Andy's Prepaid Voicepad
description:
Tons of events, and tons of money. Use Inside job to pressure early if needed, or if you get the right breakers. Ideally I want to get Professional Contacts out on turn 1, with 1 PC and 2 Hostages it is fairly likely.

If the game goes long, I can recycle my whole deck with Levy AR and play all the events over again (potentially with 3 Prepaid PADS in play). Making sure gamble just give oodles of money.

Obviously program destruction hurts this a lot, but Faerie usually covers that early game.

The Source is in the deck, so I can use it to play a bit slower in the early game, and build up while the corp can't one turn score an agenda. Helps a lot against the decks which try to kill me.
